titles: Memoirs of Edmund Ludlow Esq; Lieutenant General of the Horse, Commander in Chief of the forces in Ireland, one of the Council of State, and a Member of the Parliament which began on November 3, 1640. In two volumes.  Vol. 1.
author: Ludlow, Edmund, 1617?-1692.
publisher: printed at Vivay in the canton of Bern,
notes: A third part was published the following year.
Imperfect: copy at reel 464:29 has part 1 only.
Reproductions of the original in the Harvard University Library (reel 464).
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Puritan Revolution, 1642-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
